title: The town mascot and good luck

content.question: Why is the town mascot thought to bring good luck?

choices.label: It is associated with a lucky number.
Its designer inherited a large sum of money.
It is a symbol of long life.
It is thought to ensure safe travel.

content.answer: It is associated with a lucky number.

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Make connections among cultural and interdisciplinary information provided in texts.
